name: Ultimate platformer 3D
description:
This is  a 3D platform game. The objective of the game is get to the other side of the level. They'll be two level and the controls are WASD for the movements, space to jump, and the mouse for the directing where the character is facing.

Feedback form: https://forms.gle/2Sshz5P9V7E67EGZA

Made by Addison and Hayato
